```{r, setup, echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)

load("d1.Rda")

```

## Frequencies of Most Common Breeds

``` {r, commonBreedTab, results="asis", echo=FALSE}

breeds <- d1 %>%
    select(Dog.ID, Breed) %>%
    group_by(Breed) %>%
    count(Breed)
breeds$percent <- (breeds$n/nrow(d1))*100
breeds$percent <- round(breeds$percent, 1)

breeds5 <- filter(breeds, percent >= 5.0)

write.csv(breeds5, row.names=FALSE, file="frequentBreedTab.csv", quote=FALSE)

```
